reactor.bus.support

Class NotifyConsumer<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • reactor.bus.support.NotifyConsumer<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the values that the consumer can accept
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Consumer<T>

    public class NotifyConsumer<T>
extends Object
implements Consumer<T>
    A Consumer that notifies an observable of each value that it has accepted.
    Author:
    Jon Brisbin, Stephane Maldini

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NotifyConsumer(Object notifyKey, Bus<?> observable)
      Creates a new NotifyConsumer that will notify the given observable using the given notifyKey.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NotifyConsumer

        public NotifyConsumer(Object notifyKey,
                      Bus<?> observable)
        Creates a new NotifyConsumer that will notify the given observable using the given notifyKey. If notifyKey is null, observable will be notified without a key.
        Parameters:
        notifyKey - The notification key, may be null
        observable - The observable to notify. May not be null

        Execute the logic of the action, accepting the given parameter.

        accept in interface Consumer<T>
        Parameters:
        t - The parameter to pass to the consumer.
